public class FidoFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements javax.swing.event.MenuListener, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.print.Printable, java.awt.dnd.DropTargetListener, toolbars.ZoomToFitListener, circuit.HasChangedListener

Version   Date           Author       Remarks

2.1             July 2008                   D. Bucci    A few nice enhancements
2.2             February 2009           D. Bucci        Aquified 
2.2.1   October 2009            D. Bucci        Force Win L&F when run on Windows

The FidoFrame class describes a frame which is used to trace schematics and printed circuit boards.

See Also:
Serialized Form
